title: Fired for doubting hell’s existence
post: The summary of various ideologies, leads to a conclusion that hell is a place like hospital, where treatment is provided to all those souls who are suffering from some moral sickness. Once they are cured, they are made to enter eternal paradise. If sick souls are allowed to enter the paradise, they can start an epidemic and make everybody sick. God Almighty, created everything for the progeny of Adam & Eve. HE new that sickness will be infused by SATAN in simple and greedy people while on earth. So HE prepared an Hospital for their treatment called Hell. No need to worry, think positive and God will help you to understand HIS universe.
author: Noya
